meanings.sent1: The history book mentioned the great Caesars of ancient Rome.
meanings.sent2: The Caesars ruled over the Roman Empire with power and authority.
meanings.sent3: The children dressed up as Caesars for the historical costume party.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the actor portrayed Julius Caesar, one of the famous Caesars.
meanings.sent5: The statues of the Caesars stood tall in the museum, depicting their grandeur.

meanings.definition: A type of salad typically made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, she ordered a Caesar salad with grilled chicken.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was their delicious Caesar salad.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed the refreshing Caesar salad.
meanings.sent4: The Caesar salad was a hit at the potluck dinner, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy croutons added a delightful texture to the classic Caesar salad.
